title: Snow City Singapore: Winter Wonderland Experience
blurb: Experience snow and winter fun in tropical Singapore!
description: Snow City offers a unique winter experience with real snow, providing a fun and educational environment for families and children. Activities include snow play, a snow slide, and interactive exhibits. Perfect for escaping the heat and enjoying a taste of winter. Snow City is Singapore's first permanent indoor snow centre. It features a 60-metre snow slope for sledding and snowboarding, as well as a snow playground for kids to build snowmen and have snowball fights. The venue also hosts various events and activities throughout the year, making it a popular destination for families and tourists alike. It's an ideal place for children and adults to experience the magic of winter in a safe and controlled environment. The snow is made using a special snow-making machine that produces real snow, ensuring an authentic winter experience.
datetime_display: Tuesdays to Fridays: 10:00am – 5:00pm; Weekends, School & Public Holidays: 10:00am – 6:00pm
